   <% 
      require 'osk_c_lesson_scr' 
   %>
   SCREEN AUTO AUTO 0.5
   GLOBAL_SETTING BUTTON BACKCOLOR 221 221 221
  
   NAMED_WIDGET title TITLE "Lesson 6 - Using a Child Task for App Object Functions"
     SETTING BACKCOLOR 162 181 205
     SETTING TEXTCOLOR black

   VERTICALBOX "Objective"
     LABEL "Introduce the OSK Framework Child Task Manager and show how"
      LABEL "it can be used to run App Object functions within a child"
      LABEL "task. Note the changes are localized to app_cfg.h and osk_c_demo_app.*"
      
   END # Objectives

   VERTICALBOX "References"

      MATRIXBYCOLUMNS 4
         BUTTON 'Lesson Slides'  'osk_c_lesson_cmd(self,"REF_SLIDES")'
         BUTTON 'OSK App Dev'    'osk_c_lesson_cmd(self,"REF_OSK_APP_DEV")'
         BUTTON 'Tutorial Guide' 'osk_c_lesson_cmd(self,"REF_TUTORIAL")'
         LABEL  '        '
      END # Matrix

   END # References
       
   VERTICALBOX "Update Source Files"

      MATRIXBYCOLUMNS 3 5 5
         BUTTON 'View Lesson'   'osk_c_lesson_src(self,"SRC_VIEW_LESSON")'
         NAMED_WIDGET lesson_src_file COMBOBOX 'app_cfg.h' 'osk_c_demo_app.h' 'osk_c_demo_app.c' 
         LABEL  '        '

         BUTTON 'View Solution' 'osk_c_lesson_src(self,"SRC_VIEW_SOLUTION")'
         NAMED_WIDGET solution_src_file COMBOBOX 'app_cfg.h' 'osk_c_demo_app.h' 'osk_c_demo_app.c' 
         LABEL  '        '

         BUTTON 'Edit Current FSW'  'osk_c_lesson_src(self,"SRC_EDIT_CURRENT")'
         NAMED_WIDGET current_src_file COMBOBOX 'app_cfg.h' 'osk_c_demo_app.h' 'osk_c_demo_app.c' 'msglog.h' 'msglog.c' 'msglogtbl.h' 'msglogtbl.c'
         LABEL  '        '
      END
      
   END

   VERTICALBOX "Completed"

      MATRIXBYCOLUMNS 3 5 5
   
            NAMED_WIDGET app_cfg_h CHECKBUTTON 'app_cfg.h' UNCHECKED
            LABEL '        '
            LABEL '        '

            NAMED_WIDGET osk_c_demo_app_h CHECKBUTTON 'osk_c_demo_app.h' UNCHECKED
            NAMED_WIDGET osk_c_demo_app_c CHECKBUTTON 'osk_c_demo_app.c' UNCHECKED
            LABEL '        '
      
            NAMED_WIDGET msglog_h CHECKBUTTON 'msglog.h' CHECKED
            NAMED_WIDGET msglog_c CHECKBUTTON 'msglog.c' CHECKED
            LABEL '        '

            NAMED_WIDGET msglogtbl_h CHECKBUTTON 'msglogtbl.h' CHECKED
            NAMED_WIDGET msglogtbl_c CHECKBUTTON 'msglogtbl.c' CHECKED
            LABEL '        '

            BUTTON 'Save Status'      'osk_c_lesson_cmd(self,"LESSON_SAVE_STATUS")'
            BUTTON 'Lesson Complete'  'osk_c_lesson_cmd(self,"LESSON_COMPLETE")'
            LABEL '        '
         
      END # Matrix
   END # Completed


   VERTICALBOX "Application"
      MATRIXBYCOLUMNS 4 5
         
         BUTTON 'Build'  'osk_c_lesson_cmd(self,"APP_BUILD")'
         BUTTON 'Run'    'osk_c_lesson_cmd(self,"APP_RUN")'
         BUTTON 'Screen' 'osk_c_lesson_cmd(self,"APP_SCREEN")'
         LABEL '        '
         
      END
   END # Application
